description: Try our easy to follow Pork & Pineapple Stir-Fry recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Stir-fry,Seafood free,Egg free,Christmas leftovers,Easter leftovers,Broccolini,Quick & easy dinner,High protein,High fibre,Pork,Leftovers
name: Pork & Pineapple Stir-Fry Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 large red capsicum, trimmed, thinly sliced
440g can pineapple pieces in unsweetened juice

recipeInstructions.text: Drain pineapple and reserve 1/3 cup of the juice. Combine with kecap manis and cornflour in a jug.
Place noodles into a large bowl. Cover with boiling water and stand for 5 minutes or until noodles have separated. Drain.
Cut steaks into thin diagonal strips and place into a bowl.
Heat a wok over a high heat. Add 2 teaspoon oil and swirl around hot wok. Add 1/3 of pork and stir fry for 1-2 minutes or until browned. Transfer to a bowl. Cook remaining portions.
Heat remaining oil in wok. Stir fry capsicum and broccolini for 1 minute.
Drizzle 1 tablespoon of water over vegetables and cover. Cook for a further minute. Add shallots, pineapple pieces and sauce to vegetables with pork. Stir until well combined.
Cook for 2 minutes or until sauce comes to the boil and thickens.
